analyzed: om namaḥ loka nāthāya matsyendrāya viṣṇave
meru maṇḍala madhya stha mokṣa dāya namaḥ astu te
loka rakṣāya devāya loka nāthāya te namaḥ
kīrti hetoḥ samādhiḥ eṣā kānti dam tvām upāsmahe
nātha mantra samujjvāla nāga ābharaṇa dhāriṇe
niravadyāya buddhāya bodhi dāya namaḥ astu te
sthāna rakṣā kṛtā dhīra sthāna bhraṣṭa prapālaka
locanā māmakī tārā pāṇḍarābhyaḥ namaḥ namaḥ
yakṣa rākṣasa vetāla bhujaṅga bhaya hāriṇe
amita ābha kirīṭāya siddhi dāya namaḥ astu te
bhikṣu roma sahasrāṇi bhikṣu rakṣāya te namaḥ
śloka aṣṭakam idam puṇyam kīrtitam te samādhipa
